Services.name: Lorem ipsum dolor
Services.text: Autologous Bone Marrow Transplant - Marrow cells are collected from the patient’s own body and transfused back after high dose chemotherapy.

Services.name: Consectetur adipiscing
Services.text: Allogenic Bone Marrow Transplant (Matched Sibling Donor) – Replacement of diseased or defective marrow with marrow from a genetically (HLA) matched sibling donor.

Services.name: Lorem ipsum dolor
Services.text: Allogenic Bone Marrow Transplant (Matched Unrelated Donor) – Replacement of diseased or defective marrow with marrow from a genetically (HLA) matched donor obtained from bone marrow registries in India and abroad.

Services.name: Consectetur adipiscing
Services.text: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Duis sed dapibus leo nec ornare diam sedasd commodo nibh ante facilisis bibendum dolor feugiat at.

Services.name: Lorem ipsum dolor
Services.text: Haplo-Identical Bone Marrow Transplant - Replacement of diseased or defective marrow with marrow from the parent.

Services.name: Consectetur adipiscing
Services.text: Umbilical cord Bone Marrow Transplant - Replacement of diseased or defective marrow with marrow from a genetically (HLA) matched umbilical cord donor obtained from umbilical cord registries in India and abroad.

Warning.text: Failure to thrive – not gaining weight and height as per the age norms
Requirement of intravenous antibiotics to clear infections
Family history of death of children at young age due to immune deficiency
2 or more episodes of sinus infections within a year
Repeated abscess formation (liver abscess, brain abscess)

FAQ.title: What are the conditions that requireBone Marrow Transplant?
FAQ.content: BMT is the treatment of choice for blood disorders like Thalassemia, Sickle Cell anemia, bone marrow failure syndromes like Aplastic anemia, serious immune deficiencies and certain genetic metabolic disorders.

FAQ.title: Which are the hematological diseases that may benefit from bone marrow transplants?
FAQ.content: BMT is the treatment of choice for blood disorders like Thalassemia, Sickle Cell anemia, bone marrow failure syndromes like Aplastic anemia, serious immune deficiencies and certain genetic metabolic disorders.

FAQ.title: Which are the Cancers that may benefit from bone marrow transplants?
FAQ.content: BMT is the treatment of choice for blood disorders like Thalassemia, Sickle Cell anemia, bone marrow failure syndromes like Aplastic anemia, serious immune deficiencies and certain genetic metabolic disorders.

FAQ.title: Do bone marrow failure syndromes require BMT?
FAQ.content: BMT is the treatment of choice for blood disorders like Thalassemia, Sickle Cell anemia, bone marrow failure syndromes like Aplastic anemia, serious immune deficiencies and certain genetic metabolic disorders.

FAQ.title: What are Primary Immune Deficiency diseases ?
FAQ.content: BMT is the treatment of choice for blood disorders like Thalassemia, Sickle Cell anemia, bone marrow failure syndromes like Aplastic anemia, serious immune deficiencies and certain genetic metabolic disorders.

FAQ.title: Which are the immune deficiencies that warrant BMT?
FAQ.content: BMT is the treatment of choice for blood disorders like Thalassemia, Sickle Cell anemia, bone marrow failure syndromes like Aplastic anemia, serious immune deficiencies and certain genetic metabolic disorders.

FAQ.title: What makes transplants at Aster CMI unique?
FAQ.content: BMT is the treatment of choice for blood disorders like Thalassemia, Sickle Cell anemia, bone marrow failure syndromes like Aplastic anemia, serious immune deficiencies and certain genetic metabolic disorders.

Features.title: Lorem ipsum
Features.text: Bone Marrow Transplant (BMT) better known as haematopoietic stem cell transplant(HSCT) as bone marrow cells are transplanted.

Features.title: Lorem ipsum
Features.text: Replacement of diseased or defective marrow with marrow from a healthy donor

Features.title: Lorem ipsum
Features.text: Medicines and in certain situations radiotherapy as well is given to get rid of diseased marrow and bone marrow cells from healthy donor is given to replace it.

Features.title: Lorem ipsum
Features.text: IN autologous bone marrow transplant, high dose chemotherapy is given to kill cancer cells and child own marrow cells are given back
